reviews.review: Das Spiel machte Spass bis zum Update wo die Ranks geÃ¤ndert wurden zu Asche, etc. Seit diesem Moment an ist es nie mehr fair gewesen. Ich musste immer gegen viel StÃ¤rke Gegner antreten die bis zu 4fach hÃ¶herem Ranked haben. Diese Balance zerstÃ¶rt denn Ganzen Spass und deshalb muss ich leider nach SchÃ¶nen 676 Stunden Spielzeit das Spiel nun auf Eis legen, Da es mir momentan 0 Spass macht. Wenn das mit den Ranks gefixt wird Ã¼berlege ich es mir nochmal ob ich es Wieder spiele.

Evem though this game has mayor issues I would say it's worth it's moneys, new players however may often struggle against smurfs and can't play killer very well cause you just kinda need some perks to actually play well or even have a good time. Buy to win (and play even more to unlock) perks are all to present in this game. Your first few games at low rank might be fun but when you try to play at higher ranks you will either face long waiting time to play (as killer) because matchmaking is broken once again or just generally toxic survivors (and killers too) at higher ranks. getting to a high rank doesn't require skill, just time (or if you\re skilled a little less time) game is hugely inbalanced even at current state for both survivor and killer. at high ranks this game becomes stale, recommend playing only at low-mid ranks wich is easy if you only play it ever so often or take long pauses between playing it and not playing it.

After watching weeks of streams and videos I finally bought it and tried for myself. Here's what I think. 

The game is fun and easy as a survivor. You can pretty much shit on any killers with the right set of tools (perks/addons) and simply by having a little bit of experience. 

As a killer well, at rank 20 it's really easy. Matching against survivors about your rank and non-op perks you can have a good time chasing them down, hanging them etc. But once you reach rank 17-18 (keep in mind its just 3 ranks up) you get completely destroyed. Being a new player I don't have access to high level perks for survivors/killers. I was just trying to earn blood points every game. But it is really really hard against most survivors. If you're lucky you get to kill 2 in a game. But most of the time its just a wild goose chase as even when they won with the gates wide open, they will simply refuse to leave and taunt(teabagging is really popular in this game) the killer knowing they have nothing to stop them.
And yes. Killers have some decent tracking/chasing perks. But the survivor's perks are really too much. Dead hard, sprint burst, borrowed time, decisive strike with a trusty flashlight in hand. Let's just say you don't want to play a killer. 

I think the devs have a good concept and it's a beautiful game with nice music. But the game is in a really dark place now and it's going to take a lot of time to fine tune and balance the game. Some of the survivors understand they have really unfair tools in their arsenal and chooses to not use them to make the game more fair to the killers. But sadly, most of them are really toxic even to each other. I do not blame the players for this because it is the way the game was designed to encourage and condone this kinda 'killer bullying' behaviours. 

To conclude, I will continue to enjoy the game as a survivor but I cannot reccomend the game until some sort of balance is in place as at it's current state, no amount of DLCs will keep the players for much longer.

First things first, this is not a game for you if your looking to have a good time.
Now then. Dead by Daylight is a game for depressed suicidal losers who think that the noose is to quick of a way to go and would prefer a more slower method and DBD is here to provide. The line "Death is not an escape" refers to how when the survivors die in a match they dont die for good but instead return to the "Entity". However this goes deeper as to representing how when you die in the game you dont die in real life which is what all the players long for. The overall goal for the players is to slowly goad the other players into killing themselves first. With survivors you must bully the killers by blinding, looping, Decisive Striking and 360ing them until they give in. As for your fellow survivors you must sandbag them, unhook them in front of the killer and body block the exit gate lever so they cant open it. If you are playing killer you must face camp survivors, tunnel them, use NOED and try to get a 4 slug when you can. When all DBD players but one have finally given in and hung themselves the last player will be  considered the grand champion of Dead by Daylight and be presented with a Glock 21.

Well, after playing for almost 6 years now, this game is not worth buying anymore. The updates are either broken, or are just cosmetic cash grabs. The dead by Daylight Discord server is basically china, because if you say anything bad about the game they will either mute kick or ban you, every single update that is released, just breaks the game, and some of the updates are just rushed, they make changes that no one asked for or the update just feels rushed, every dlc that they release is just a rushed attempt at stealing your money, and the new killers use a different version of an older killers ability, like trickster, his ability is a worse version than huntress, ghostface am ok version of myers, and the newest killer, the artist is just a worse version of pyramid head. my point is that nothing has been original since 2018 or even 2017, and its kind of sad to see that this game has gone down this road, since i thought this would be an actual good game, but like i said ever since 2018 this game has just been going downhill, instead of them actually rushing new dlcs every month or two, why dont they just spend 2, 4 or even 6 months of just patching bugs, i know this is something they could never do because its bhvr, but they just need to fix this game. i wish this game was actually cared about instead of just seeing it as a money making machine. and i will say this, it is kind of sad to see a game like this go from, people actually being terrified of the killer, to loop for 5 gens gg ez, if you want to get this game be my guest. but if you are going to get it, just know what i said, you will be another pawn in this game, you will be used by a cash grabbing, rushed dlc, game breaking, toxic, no killer is original since 2018 game. i will also admit that this games music department makes the sickest of beats. welp after the devs banned me for no reason, i am finally free from the curse of unlimited dead by daylight
